players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I am the detective, and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today!"
Bob: "I am the real detective. Alice is lying to frame me. I investigated Charlie and he is innocent."
You: "Bob is lying; I'm the real detective and investigated him—he's the mafioso. Charlie, trust my claim and vote with me!"
Bob: "Alice is the only one who could have killed Diana. I'm the detective and confirmed Charlie is innocent. Vote Alice to save the town."
